title: German Christmas fruit cake
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '150g caster sugar', '75g chopped nuts of your choice', '50g chopped almonds', '100g dried pitted prunes', '100g dried pitted apricots', '100g dried pitted dates', '100g dried figs', '100g raisins', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '2 teaspoons mixed spice', '125g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '3 tablespoons framboise liqueur or other fruit brandy', '1 handful peeled raw almonds for the garnish']
